entry.title: Game: BIT.TRIP RUNNER (Steam, 2011)
entry.content:
Game: BIT.TRIP RUNNER (Steam, 2011)20140116
I played this for about an hour and a half. I got up to the last
level of the first world. In almost every level I was able to get
all the Gold, but I found it really challenging to get the ones
where you had to "kick" after going on a spring. It was a
pain. This game is really fun though.

Total time: 1:22
  • Video Games
  • BIT.TRIP RUNNER
  • Steam
  • 2011

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (11)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (11)20140116
We played for thirty minutes and beat the last level, then went
back to 9-7. We got nearly to the end a few times but little
mistakes ended in our death. Next time!

--

Later in the day, we played for another forty-five minutes and
beat the game. We watched all the movies and got 99 lives. Our
save file have 5 Shining Stars, World 9, and 99 Lives. Nice!

This game is so amazing. I can't wait to break out the WiiU and
play those games with my wife.

Total time: 36:19
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers Wii
  • Wii
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X2 (SNES, 1994) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Mega Man X2 (SNES, 1994) (2)20140115
I played today for about thirty minutes today and played one
continue against the Gator boss. I died but came pretty close to
winning. I find this game to be very painful to play because you
have to constantly wall jump while holding down a charge
shot. Ouch.

Total time: 1:09
  • Video Games
  • Mega Man X2
  • SNES
  • 1994

entry.title: Movie: Contact, starring Jodie Foster (1997) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Contact, starring Jodie Foster (1997) (2)20140115
I love this movie so much. There are so many moments that make me
cry with inspiration. I decided to watch it because Cosmos has been
making me think about it a lot. It was a good choice.
  • Movies
  • 1997

entry.title: Game: Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale (Steam, 2010)
entry.content:
Game: Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale (Steam, 2010)20140114
I played this game for about an hour. I got passed the first week
with a huge profit and got my adventurer's level up a lot. The
game is pretty cute, but too basic for my taste. It is basically
just about grinding, but the mechanics of battles aren't
particularly good compared to best-in-class action RPGs. 

I don't regret spending an hour with the game, but I do regret
spending $5 on it during the Steam sale. I think the subject
matter is very cute and the concept is very unique, but neither is
strong enough to support the bland mechanics.

Total time: 1:14
  • Video Games
  • Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale
  • Steam
  • 2010

entry.title: Game: Breath of Death VII (Steam, 2010) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Breath of Death VII (Steam, 2010) (2)20140113
I beat the game tonight in about an hour. I was kind of
disappointed by the last dungeon, because it was so easy. I
grinded at the first save point so I could explore without random
battles. I creamed the dopplegangers and the last boss was easy as
well with regeneration. The game was fun overall, especially for
its length and cost.

Total time: 4:45
  • Video Games
  • Breath of Death VII
  • Steam
  • 2010

entry.title: Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 10 - The Edge of Forever
entry.content:
Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 10 - The Edge of Forever20140113
This was a great episode. I really enjoyed the perspective on the
different ways that the topology of our universe could be
like. The shadow of the hypercube was super cool. I was amazed at
the idea that a snowflake is more "powerful" than all the energy
our telescopes have observed.
  • TV Shows
  • Cosmos: A Personal Voyage

entry.title: Game: Breath of Death VII (Steam, 2010)
entry.content:
Game: Breath of Death VII (Steam, 2010)20140112
I started this today played for about two hours. I got passed the
bonus cave 3. The game is a lot more basic in so many ways than
the other Zeboyd games, but it has a few cool things going for
it. I particularly like the jokey dialogue about RPG tropes.

Later in the day I played for another two hours and beat the
Turrets.

Total time: 3:46
  • Video Games
  • Breath of Death VII
  • Steam
  • 2010

entry.title: Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 9 - The Lives of the Stars
entry.content:
Cosmos: A Personal Voyage - Season 1 - Episode 9 - The Lives of the Stars20140112
We watched this with our kids and had a fun time looking at the
awesome pictures of stars. I especially love thinking about being
made out of stars.
  • TV Shows
  • Cosmos: A Personal Voyage

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (5)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (5)20140111
I played for three hours today and completely finished the game: I
have all 5 Shining Save Stars, which required getting Triple Crown
lives. This was a very good game, but not as good as 3D Land or
New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

Total time: 14:54
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers 2
  • 3DS
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (10)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers Wii (Wii, 2009) (10)20140111
We played tonight for about two hours. We did everything on 9-4,
9-5, and 9-6. 9-4 was quite hard. We also spent a lot of time on
9-7, but it was brutal and we couldn't get passed where the second
Star coin was. We depleted all of my wife's lives, so we grinded
some more.

Total time: 35:04
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers Wii
  • Wii
  • 2009

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (4)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (4)20140110
I played today for about two hours and beat the game so I could
start on the Star World. I had tried to unlock everything along
the way, so I didn't have enough stars for the first Star level,
which was a pain to go get a few that I missed. The final boss was
fun.

Total time: 11:44

  • New Super Mario Brothers 2
  • 3DS
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: Kick-Ass 2, starring Aaron Johnson (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Kick-Ass 2, starring Aaron Johnson (2013)20140110
This movie was just as good as, or better than, the first movie. It
had a new way to show the "real life" of super heros. I
particularly like the way that Mindy's life went. I was kind of
surprised at how good they were able to make it.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (3)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers 2 (3DS, 2012) (3)20140108
I played today for about three hours on a plane ride and did all
of the two special worlds (modulo some exits) and then through to
the middle of world 5. This game is still pretty awesome. I think
I liked 3D Land better though, so far.

Total time: 9:26

entry.title: Movie: Kick-Ass, starring Aaron Johnson (2010)
entry.content:
Movie: Kick-Ass, starring Aaron Johnson (2010)20140108
This was an intense movie. It's so raw. Hit Girl's life is just too
sad to really get too excited about. I really liked all the scenes
about "real life" in the movie.
  • Movies
  • 2010

entry.title: Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 2, starring Uma Thurman (2004)
entry.content:
Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 2, starring Uma Thurman (2004)20140108
This is a great movie and quite a bit more touching than the first
one. I cried a little when The Bride was in the grave and when she
saw BB for the first time. I love the training sequence a lot. It
is so intense when she finally gets Elle.
  • Movies
  • 2004

entry.content:
Movie: Kill Bill, Vol. 1, starring Uma Thurman (2003)20140108
This is such an epic movie. The Bride is tough in so many different
ways, I love it.

entry.title: Movie: Borat, starring Sacha Baron Cohen (2006)
entry.content:
Movie: Borat, starring Sacha Baron Cohen (2006)20140107
This movie is utterly insane. I can't believe that he really did
these things, but I can't tell how he could have faked some of
it. The bear! All the crazy stuff about Jewish people! Insane.
  • Movies
  • 2006

entry.title: Movie: Team America: World Police, directed by Trey Parker (2004)
entry.content:
Movie: Team America: World Police, directed by Trey Parker (2004)20140107
This movie is insane. The use of puppets is just amazing. I loved
the moment when the "panthers" came out and the amazing songs. I
almost can't believe that this movie was made. The additional
credits song was great.
  • Movies
  • 2004
